title: Santa Fe National Historic Trail: Whittington Center
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Exhibits     New Mexico Exhibits     Whittington Center                  Whittington Center         Whittington Center   This exhibit focuses on the trail in the area of the Colorado-New Mexico border and is located at the NRA Whittington Center - Frank Brownell Museum of the Southwest. Click here to view the exhibit (853 KB, pdf).
